    • Method Detail

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle()
        method shuffles the cards in cards array. Swaps two random cards randomly on each increment of the loop SHUFFLE_SCALE times.

      • swap

        public void swap(int cardIndex1,
                 int cardIndex2)
        Parameters:
        int - cardIndex1, int cardIndex2: two integers from 0-deckSize() lower bound inclusive and upper bound exclusive. Swaps these two objects in respecive array.

      • deal

        public Card deal()
        creates temp array to copy new array onto with deckSize()-1 size left after removal of one card.
        Returns:
        Card: returns card object from cards[0]

      • getCards

        public Card[] getCards()
        basic getter of cards @return Card[] which is cards

      • deckSize

        public int deckSize()
        basic getter of cards.length @return cards.length

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        loops cards[] and prints individual cards, string builder to build return string
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
